name: Goobler's Magic Shop: a game by Shovel
name_original: Goobler's Magic Shop: a game by Shovel
description:
My entry for the Miz Game Jam.

This is the first game I've ever made using the Godot engine.
I have the footage during development, I will be posting a link to the devlog once I've edited and uploaded it.

Hope you enjoy the game! Looking forward to feedback!
